alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 5:57PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gulf, southeastern Bay, southwestern Liberty and northwestern Franklin Counties through 645 PM EDT/545 PM CDT/... At 557 PM EDT/457 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southeast of Wewahitchka, or 15 miles northeast of Port St. Joe, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Port St. Joe, Mexico Beach, Wewahitchka, Tyndall Air Force Base, Honeyville, Allanton, Eleven Mile, Odena, Cape San Blas, Indian Pass, Beverly, Overstreet, Milltown, Davis Beach, Willis Landing, Wetappo, Simmons Bayou, Dalkeith, Saint Joe Beach and Fort Gadsden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH

area.areaDesc: Coastal Bay; Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty
